ScriptKeyword.Title: Kill Priority
ScriptKeyword.Description: Sets the priority of a creature attack.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Kill Spell
ScriptKeyword.Description: Sets the spell to kill some creature.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Kill Rune
ScriptKeyword.Description: Sets the rune used to kill some creature.
ScriptKeyword.Parameters: [Monster Name], [Rune ID], [Delay in seconds], [Creature Min HP]

ScriptKeyword.Title: Kill Only My Creatures
ScriptKeyword.Description: Will attack only creatures that are attacking you.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Ignore Creature
ScriptKeyword.Description: Sets that some creature will not be attacked.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Avoid Front
ScriptKeyword.Description: Sets that some creature should not be attacked by front.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Set Loot
ScriptKeyword.Description: Add some item to loot list.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Log
ScriptKeyword.Description: Send a message to tibia client as system message.
ScriptKeyword.Examples: Ex. log("Starting the hunt") log("Depositing countitem(3031) gold coins.")

ScriptKeyword.Title: Goto
ScriptKeyword.Description: Move the player to some location.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Goto Section
ScriptKeyword.Description: Move the execution to some script section.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Goto Line
ScriptKeyword.Description: Move the execution to some script line.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Set Parameter
ScriptKeyword.Description: Sets the value to some script parameter.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Get Parameter
ScriptKeyword.Description: Gets the value from some script parameter.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Check Value
ScriptKeyword.Description: Execute some action if the expression is true.
ScriptKeyword.Examples: Ex. checkvalue(countitem({Spear}) < 5 = gotosection(HuntToDepot)) checkvalue([CAP] < getparam("MinCap") = gotosection(HuntToDepot)) checkvalue(countitem(3031) > 3000 = gotoline(53))

ScriptKeyword.Title: Get Value
ScriptKeyword.Description: Parse the expression and returns the value.
ScriptKeyword.Examples: Ex. setparam("SpearToBuy", getvalue([CAP] / getparam("SpearWeigth"))) setparam("MoneyToSpears", getvalue(getparam("SpearToBuy") * getparam("SpearCost"))) setparam("CustomValue", getvalue((30 * 10) / 129 + 5))

ScriptKeyword.Title: Count Item
ScriptKeyword.Description: Gets the total count of some item in opened containers.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Find Empty Depot
ScriptKeyword.Description: Finds and go to some empty depot storage.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Deposit Loot
ScriptKeyword.Description: Open the storage and deposit all items contained in loot list.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Say
ScriptKeyword.Description: Makes the player say the message.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Buy
ScriptKeyword.Description: Makes the player buy some item after the npc conversation has been started.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Error
ScriptKeyword.Description: Stop the script and log the error.
ScriptKeyword.Examples: Ex. error("You have no balance to buy spears!")

ScriptKeyword.Title: Name
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the NAME of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Cap
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the CAP of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: HP
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the Hit points of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Level
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the Level of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: MLevel
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the Magic Level of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Mana
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the Mana points of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Soul
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the Soul points of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Stamina
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the Stamina of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Fist Skill
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the Fist Skill of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Club Skill
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the Club Skill of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Distance Skill
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the Distance Skill of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Axe Skill
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the Axe Skill of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Shield Skill
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the Shield Skill of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Fish Skill
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the Fish Skill of the player.

ScriptKeyword.Title: Item
ScriptKeyword.Description: Returns the ID of some stored item.
